CustomField.description: This checkbox field indicates whether the contact has opted out of receiving emails. When the contact unsubscribes, this field is automatically marked as true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the contact has unsubscribed from email communications through ActiveCampaign. When checked, it means the contact will no longer receive email notifications and marketing messages from ActiveCampaign.
CustomField.label: Email Unsubscribed
